meanings.definition: A stone laid in a path to walk on.
meanings.sent1: The garden had beautiful steppingstones leading to the front door.
meanings.sent2: She carefully hopped from one steppingstone to another to avoid the mud.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the steppingstones to play hopscotch.
meanings.sent4: Each steppingstone in life brings us closer to our dreams.
meanings.sent5: The steppingstones in the river glistened in the sunlight, inviting us to cross.

meanings.definition: A means of progress or advancement.
meanings.sent1: Education is often seen as a steppingstone to a successful career.
meanings.sent2: Hard work and dedication can be the steppingstones to achieving your goals.
meanings.sent3: The magic potion was rumored to turn into steppingstones when spilled on the ground.
meanings.sent4: Each failure can be a steppingstone towards future success if we learn from it.
meanings.sent5: The mentorship program served as a steppingstone for young entrepreneurs to thrive.
